title: The father of the U.S. Navy descending back to Obama with an incredible message of condolence with Topouk.
subtitle: :: Rumours: the father of a Marine has fallen in response to a letter of condolence from President Obama with a hand-written reaction.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The father of a Marine who fell a message of condolence from President Obama returned with a written reply.
